Package models

Class Suggestion

java.lang.Object
models.Suggestion
public class Suggestion extends Object
The Suggestion class represents a suggestion made by a CommitteeMember in CAMs. A suggestion includes an ID, the suggestion message, the suggester's name, and an approval status indicating whether the suggestion has been approved.

The class provides constructors for importing Suggestion instances from CSV and for creating new suggestions initiated by CommitteeMember. Additionally, it contains methods for retrieving and modifying the details of a suggestion.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Chin Jun Hao, Mark

      suggestion - The content of the suggestion message.
      suggester - The name of the committee member making the suggestion.
      approved - The approval status of the suggestion.
